Utterance: Hi there! It’s great to see you again. How have you been since our last session?
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been okay, I guess. I wrote that letter to my dad, and it felt good to get it out.
That’s wonderful! How did it feel to express your thoughts and feelings in that way?
It was really freeing. I felt like I could finally say everything I wanted without worrying about his reaction.
I’m glad to hear that! Did you share the letter with him?
I did! He was really touched, and it opened up a conversation between us.
That’s fantastic! It sounds like it helped strengthen your connection. What did you both talk about?
We talked about his feelings, and he opened up a bit about his fears. It was nice to see him vulnerable.
That’s a significant step forward. How did that make you feel?
It made me feel closer to him. I think it helped both of us to be honest.
That’s beautiful. Being open can create a safe space for both of you. Have you noticed any changes in your feelings since then?
I feel a bit lighter, like I’m not carrying as much weight.
That’s wonderful progress! Have you continued with the relaxation techniques we discussed?
Yes, I’ve been doing the muscle relaxation before bed, and it’s been helping me sleep better.
That’s great to hear! Sleep is so important for your overall well-being. Have you had any stress dreams lately?
Actually, I’ve had a couple, but they weren’t as intense as before.
That’s a positive sign! It sounds like you’re making progress. How do you feel about your anxiety surrounding your dad’s health?
I still worry, but I think talking about it has helped me find some peace.
That’s a healthy shift. It’s natural for those worries to linger, but it sounds like you’re managing them better.
Yeah, I think so.
Have you found any additional support from friends or family during this time?
I’ve been talking to my friends more, and they’ve been really supportive. It feels good to lean on them.
That’s excellent! It’s essential to have a support network. Have you noticed any changes in your relationships since you’ve been more open?
I think so. I feel like I’m connecting with them on a deeper level.
That’s wonderful to hear! Vulnerability can strengthen relationships. What about your acting work? How has that been going?
It’s been busy! I’ve had more auditions, which is exciting but also stressful.
That’s a lot to juggle. How do you manage the stress of auditions alongside everything else?
I try to keep a routine and remind myself it’s just part of the process.
That’s a healthy mindset! Have you found any rituals that help you prepare for auditions?
I’ve started doing some breathing exercises before I go in. It helps calm my nerves.
That’s a great technique! It’s important to find what works for you. How do you feel after the auditions?
I feel relieved afterward, no matter the outcome. It’s like a weight is lifted.
That’s a positive perspective. Focusing on the process rather than the outcome can be very beneficial.
Yeah, I’m trying to embrace that mindset.
That’s fantastic! Are there any specific goals you’d like to set for your acting career moving forward?
I’d like to explore more roles that challenge me and step out of my comfort zone.
That sounds like a great goal! Challenging yourself can lead to growth. Are there specific types of roles you’re interested in?
I’d love to try something dramatic. I usually do more comedic roles, so I think it would be a good change.
That’s an exciting direction! It could provide a new perspective on your craft. Would you like to set a goal related to pursuing those roles?
Yes, I’d like to take a class focused on dramatic acting in the next month.
That’s a fantastic goal! Taking that step can help you grow as an actor.
I’m really looking forward to it!
Great! As we wrap up today, what’s one takeaway you’d like to focus on before our next session?
I’d like to continue working on my relaxation techniques and start researching classes for dramatic acting.
Those sound like excellent goals! I’m excited to hear about your progress next time.
Thanks, Ellie! I appreciate your support.
You’re very welcome! Take care, and I’ll see you soon.
Bye!
Goodbye!
